channel.title: Another Client "Starting" Problem
channel.description:
I only get this error on this computer. I dont know why I get this error, the class is located in the file.. So im not sure.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Also my run.bat code is
[code]@echo off TITLE Run cd bin JAVA -Xmx800m client 0 0 highmem members 0 pause[/code]

item.title: Another Client "Starting" Problem
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

I only get this error on this computer.
I dont know why I get this error, the class is located in the fileâ€¦
So im not sure.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

Also my run.bat code is

@echo off TITLE Run cd bin JAVA -Xmx800m client 0 0 highmem members 0 pause
